sense.gloss: to believe, to believe in, to place trust in, to confide in, to have faith in

sdata.j: ↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓もできないのに、↑一体↑↓いったい↓↑何↑↓なに↓を↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓だと↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|のだ？
sdata.e: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?

sdata.e: It is foolish of you to believe such a thing.

sdata.j: ↑願↑↓ねが↓っていることはすぐに↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|。
sdata.e: We soon believe what we desire.

sdata.e: What led you to believe it?

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|↑事↑↓こと↓が↑現代↑↓げんだい↓の↑若者↑↓わかもの↓にとってどれほど↑難↑↓むずか↓しいか、おわかりにならないようですね。
sdata.e: You don't seem to understand how difficult it is for young people today to believe in something.

sdata.e: If you see the day through with Mr Bark without losing your temper, I'll believe you.

sdata.j: どうしてそれを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|ようになりましたか。
sdata.e: How did you come to believe that?

sdata.j: ですから↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|ことです。
sdata.e: So you've got to be a believer.

sdata.j: たとえ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑何↑↓なに↓を↑言↑↓い↓おうと、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|。
sdata.e: She believes him, whatever he says.

sdata.e: Even if pigs were to fly in the air, I would believe her.

sdata.e: They must be crazy to believe such nonsense.

sdata.e: It was stupid of me to believe that!

sdata.e: That whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

sdata.e: Many a man believes the story.

sdata.e: So that through him all man might believe.

sdata.e: He must be stupid to believe such a thing.

sdata.j: ↑他↑↓た↓の↑点↑↓てん↓では↑分別↑↓ふんべつ↓のある↑人↑↓ひと↓が、この↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑屋根↑↓やね↓、あの↑殆↑↓ほとん↓ど↑幻想↑↓げんそう↓になりつつある↑商品↑↓しょうひん↓が↑荷造↑↓にづく↓りをして↑別↑↓べつ↓の↑国↑↓くに↓へ↑行↑↓い↓くだけで↑自由↑↓じゆう↓に↑手↑↓て↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ると↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|ようになるのはどうしてなのか、ということである。
sdata.e: How is it that otherwise reasonable people come to believe that this same roof, that practically vanishing commodity, is freely obtainable just by packing up and going to another country?

sdata.j: きっと↑彼↑↓かれ↓はあなたを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|と↑思↑↓おも↓いますよ。

sdata.e: Can anyone believe you?

sdata.e: Jesus said, "You believe because I told you I saw you under the fig tree."

sdata.e: I can't possibly think your story is true.

sdata.e: I can not believe you, whatever reasons you may give.
